COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x164
STRING: It was still early when I opened my eyes; no one had
woken me up.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x17a
STRING: Perhaps I'd awakened subconsciously because it was an
important day.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x190
STRING: [Chris] “...Morning.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a6
STRING: There was no answer, of course; my voice simply
dissolved into thin air.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1bc
STRING: Grudgingly, I got out of bed and looked at the clock.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c8
STRING: I'm sure we'd agreed yesterday to practice at ten in the
morning, but I really didn't want to.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1de
STRING: Then again, I couldn't go without doing anything, so,
still groggy with sleep, I dragged myself over to the
Fortelle and sat down.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x210
STRING: When I played the beginning of the song, it felt as if
Phorni was still beside me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x226
STRING: But no matter how many times I looked back, straining
my ears, there was no sign of her.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x23c
STRING: As if such a fairy had never existed in the first place.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x248
STRING: I got up, almost involuntarily, opened the drawer and
read Phorni's letter again.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x25e
STRING: It was a short letter, with just one sentence.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x26a
STRING: All I wanted was to reassure myself of her existence.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x276
STRING: I sat down again in front of the Fortelle, placing my
fingers on the keyboard.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x29e
STRING: Confirming Phorni's tracks must've calmed me down, as
my fingers moved smoothly across the keys.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2b4
STRING: It was so far off from what I needed to do at that time,
but I didn't care.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2ca
STRING: With the thought that this was the last time I'd play this
song, I played it with all my heart, right up to the very
last note.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2e0
STRING: I listened with my whole body, determined not to forget
those lingering tones, and then I headed for the shower.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x328
STRING: After showering and putting on my uniform, I went out
to find it raining harder than usual, and I felt I'd be
soaked in no time.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x33e
STRING: I headed to school at a speed in between walking and
running.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x34a
STRING: I was going to fulfill my last promise to Fal.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x356
STRING: I didn't want to think about what came after that.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x362
STRING: About having to return to my hometown, about no
longer being a student, about having to work for a
living.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x382
STRING: I didn't have the capacity for those thoughts.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x38e
STRING: All I could think about was how much I wanted this day
to end, quickly.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3d4
STRING: After passing through the gates, I noticed someone
standing in front of the concert hall looking this way.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3ea
STRING: Having nothing else to do, I rushed over.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x41c
STRING: [Fal] “Morning... Or should I say, good afternoon.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x44a
STRING: Didn't I tell you yesterday about practice?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x460
STRING: [Chris] “I played the Fortelle at home this morning.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x492
STRING: [Fal] “...Whatever. There's a one hour break in the
program right now.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4b2
STRING: [Chris] “And?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4e4
STRING: [Fal] “I'd really like to practice together at least once,
but I doubt that's going to happen.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x504
STRING: [Chris] “If you don't mind, I'd prefer not to.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x536
STRING: [Fal] “The rules say we have to be by the stage fifteen
minutes beforehand, so let's head to the concert hall.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x556
STRING: [Chris] “...Alright.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x588
STRING: [Fal] “...What about the rain? Aren't you cold?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x59e
STRING: [Chris] “When you're this wet, you're bound to feel a
little cold, right.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5da
STRING: [Fal] “Come here.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x606
STRING: [Chris] “... Nah, I'm fine.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x61c
STRING: I brushed her hand aside as she reached for mine,
without much force, just enough to show how I felt.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x64e
STRING: [Fal] “...I see. So be it.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x664
STRING: [Chris] “So all I have to do is be in front of the stage
fifteen minutes before, right?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x696
STRING: [Fal] “Yes, that's fine.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6ac
STRING: [Chris] “Okay, then I'll find some way to pass the time.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6de
STRING: [Fal] “As you wish.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6f4
STRING: Fal spoke evenly, with her unchanging expression that
was almost a smile.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x70a
STRING: And then, as if I intended to practice, I entered the
Second Hall without turning back once.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x720
STRING: Was I the bad guy for not giving in to her, or was she in
the wrong, having forced things to this state?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x736
STRING: I didn't think I had an answer to that.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7c0
STRING: Our performance was a complete non-event.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7cc
STRING: There was some applause, but that was all.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7d8
STRING: Not bad, and certainly not good.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7e4
STRING: My fingers moved perfectly, thanks to all that practice,
and her singing was perfect as well.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7fa
STRING: But, that was all.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x822
STRING: [Fal] “Thank you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x838
STRING: [Chris] “...Don't mention it.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x856
STRING: [Fal] “I guess this is goodbye.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x86c
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x88a
STRING: [Fal] “That's rather cold of you. Well, whatever.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8a0
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah, whatever.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8d2
STRING: [Fal] “I don't think we'll meet again. So long.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8ea
STRING: [Chris] “...Uh-huh, so long.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x900
STRING: With that, she walked off.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x916
STRING: I watched her head for the school hall, then I followed
behind her.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x92c
STRING: We were going in the same direction, but our paths had
already diverged.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x938
STRING: She would continue along her path, and I had to find a
new one.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9c0
STRING: She dragged me by the hand into the building.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9f6
STRING: Although it was lunchtime, there was no one around.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa02
STRING: Fal must have picked the First Hall on purpose, figuring
that most students would be on their way to the
cafeteria.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa18
STRING: The hallway was deserted, which made me feel even
colder.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa4a
STRING: [Fal] “Lower your head a bit.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa62
STRING: Even before she'd finished her sentence, she forced my
head down and began wiping my hair with a towel.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa78
STRING: [Chris] “...Hey!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa96
STRING: [Fal] “If you get sick, I'm the one who'll suffer.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xaac
STRING: Wrapped in the towel's warmth and the sweet smell of
soap, I almost felt relaxed.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xac2
STRING: It was as if I'd found a small part of the happiness I'd
recently lost.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xaf4
STRING: [Fal] “What about your hands? Can't have them freeze
up when the time comes.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb0a
STRING: This time, she took my hands into hers and rubbed
them together.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb3c
STRING: [Fal] “...They're really cold.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb66
STRING: [Chris] “...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb7c
STRING: My palms grew warm between her hands, proving once
more that warm blood ran through her veins.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb92
STRING: ...Which was incredibly obvious, but then I remembered
how Fal had said such cruel things yesterday, and it felt
so incongruous.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbb2
STRING: I opened my mouth, thinking that I needed to say
something, but she sensed someone walking toward us
and motioned for silence.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbda
STRING: [Fal] “Be quiet.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbfa
STRING: The footsteps grew louder, and then I saw who it was.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc2a
STRING: [Grave] “Ah, Falsita.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc5c
STRING: [Fal] “Good morning.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc7a
STRING: [Grave] “You're performing today?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcac
STRING: [Fal] “Yes. I will be performing with Chris here, from the
Fortelle course.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcd4
STRING: [Grave] “Is that so? Well, I have high hopes for you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd06
STRING: [Fal] “Thank you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd3a
STRING: Without looking at me even once, he walked away.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd46
STRING: Fal smiled as he left, then turned to face me with the
same expression.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd64
STRING: [Fal] “That nobleman is my benefactor, the one who
took me in.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd7a
STRING: [Chris] “...Do you dislike him?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdac
STRING: [Fal] “Yes. And his daughter, too.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdc2
STRING: [Chris] “...His daughter?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdf4
STRING: [Fal] “Never mind, that's irrelevant.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe0a
STRING: With scorn in her voice, she looked off into the distance.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe16
STRING: She held a necklace in her hand, and she kept rubbing
its surface.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe2c
STRING: I felt I'd seen that gesture many times before; perhaps it
was a habit of hers.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe5e
STRING: [Fal] “Alright, it's almost time.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe74
STRING: Before I asked, Fal looked at the clock and got up.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xec4
STRING: The side of the stage was quiet, perhaps because it was
still lunchtime.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xed0
STRING: Having been instructed to do so by the
student-in-charge, I silently set up my Fortelle on stage
behind the curtain.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xee6
STRING: Meanwhile, Fal's eyes never once left her score, and
seeing her like that comforted me somewhat.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf12
STRING: [Cordell] “Are you both ready?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf28
STRING: Ms. Cordell, who didn't know anything, called out to us
from behind.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf5a
STRING: [Fal] “Ah, yes. All preparations are complete.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf8c
STRING: [Cordell] “Excellent. And what about you, Chris?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfa2
STRING: [Chris] “...Yes.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfc0
STRING: [Cordell] “...Hmm? Is something the matter?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xff2
STRING: [Fal] “I think he's just a little nervous.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1020
STRING: Isn't that right?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1036
STRING: As always, her smile was perfect.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1042
STRING: It was so natural, it didn't seem possible that she could
be so disparaging of others.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1058
STRING: [Chris] “...Yeah.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x106e
STRING: The comfort I'd felt earlier vanished instantly.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x107a
STRING: This was, indeed, the same Fal from yesterday.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x108e
STRING: [Cordell] “...Chris, Falsita...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10c0
STRING: [Fal] “Excuse us, the buzzer will go off any second now.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10e4
STRING: Fal dragged me by the hand to the edge of the stage,
as if she wanted to separate me from my teacher.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1116
STRING: [Fal] “It's almost time.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x112c
STRING: Lacking the strength to pull free, I merely nodded.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1140
STRING: Right then, the sound of the buzzer filled the hall, and
the chatter of the audience stopped.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1172
STRING: [Fal] “Let's go.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11bc
STRING: I walked on stage, but it felt like something happening
faraway.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11d2
STRING: Stopping at my spot, I placed my fingers on the
Fortelle's keyboard.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11f6
STRING: Fal turned to face me, searching for my gaze in order to
synchronize our breathing.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x120c
STRING: That image blurred into another, a girl speaking of her
dream to sing on stage someday, and I felt transported
back in time.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1222
STRING: Then I realized that our breathing was in sync, and all
our preparations were complete.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1238
STRING: My fingers started to play the notes they'd rehearsed
over and over again.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12d4
STRING: By the time I noticed, the performance was over, and
we were showered with thunderous applause.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12ea
STRING: During the performance, there had been many things on
my mind.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12f8
STRING: Fal, Phorni, Arie and Torta too, of course.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x130e
STRING: And then, Asino and Ms. Cordell.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x131c
STRING: My fingers, acting almost independently, had given a
flawless performance.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1334
STRING: Through the Fortelle, I had put my conflicting emotions
on display: confusion, sadness, sometimes anger.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x134a
STRING: Even some of Fal's emotions had become mixed up
inside me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1360
STRING: There was no confusion in her.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x136e
STRING: There was only a girl's simple desire for happiness.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x13aa
STRING: [Fal] “...Chris.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x13c0
STRING: Amid the endless applause, Fal said my name in a soft
voice.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x13d6
STRING: I was brought back to reality, whereupon I took a bow
with her, and then we walked down off the stage.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x140e
STRING: Ms. Cordell and two other people were waiting for us
below.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1424
STRING: Before I realized it, Torta and Asino had appeared.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1456
STRING: [Fal] “I'll be at our usual practice room.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x146e
STRING: Just as the others drew near, Fal whispered that in my
ear and left.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1484
STRING: Torta and Ms. Cordell praised our performance, the
former with her usual smile, and the latter wearing a
very uncharacteristic one.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x149a
STRING: They found it extremely moving, like nothing they'd
heard before.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x14b0
STRING: As for Asino, he waved at me from a distance and then
disappeared.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x14c6
STRING: Briefly thanking Torta and the others for their kind
words, I took my leave.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x150c
STRING: I stood in front of the practice room and sighed deeply.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1518
STRING: I hadn't made up my mind yet.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1524
STRING: There was no point standing here like this, so I opened
the door with conviction.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1562
STRING: There she was.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x156e
STRING: She seemed calm, as if we were about to have a little
chat.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x159e
STRING: [Fal] “That was fast. I thought you'd talk to them for a
while longer.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x15b4
STRING: [Chris] “I was more interested in talking to you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x15d2
STRING: [Fal] “Is that so? Does that mean I should get my hopes
up?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x15f2
STRING: I had no answer, and my silence made her snicker.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1624
STRING: [Fal] “Let's go somewhere else. This room is hardly an
ideal setting.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1644
STRING: [Chris] “Anywhere is fine with me.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1676
STRING: [Fal] “Then let's go.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x168c
STRING: Fal sounded upbeat as she headed outside.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x16a2
STRING: I sensed where this was heading, but I had no choice
but to follow her.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x16ea
STRING: The rain had lightened a little.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x16f6
STRING: Fal seemed to be weaving in and out of the rain, then
she stopped at one part of the avenue.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x170c
STRING: We stood under a large tree with overlapping leaves,
which shielded us somewhat from the rain.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1722
STRING: That was where Fal started speaking again.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x174e
STRING: [Fal] “And so this is the end. Now will you give me an
honest answer?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1764
STRING: [Chris] “...Yes.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x177a
STRING: I was a little shocked by her abruptness.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x178e
STRING: [Fal] “I like you, Chris. I find myself entranced by the
sound of your Fortelle. I feel I can go even further, with
you by my side.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x17c0
STRING: [Fal] “That's why I did all those things to make you like
me, some of which were terrible and hurtful to others.
Still, I wanted you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x17f2
STRING: [Fal] “I should have just kept it hidden, but I couldn't. I
wanted you to see the real me. Beyond that... I also
wanted you to come with me.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1824
STRING: [Fal] “I'll say it once more. Come with me.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x183a
STRING: It was a surprisingly genuine declaration of her feelings.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1846
STRING: This was her true self, the girl beneath the veneer of
lies.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1852
STRING: Without any attempt to repair her image, without
showing any remorse for her misdeeds, all she wanted
was me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1868
STRING: For that very reason, I had to answer sincerely.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x18a6
STRING: [Chris] “...Alright.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x18bc
STRING: As I answered, I felt my mind cloud over just as if I had
a fever.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x18d2
STRING: She was unsightly, and that was beautiful.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x18e6
STRING: [Fal] “...Really?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x18fc
STRING: She sounded almost fearful.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1908
STRING: Had her show of confidence been nothing but an act
from the beginning?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x191e
STRING: [Chris] “...Really.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x193c
STRING: [Fal] “I see.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x195a
STRING: I heard her speak those words.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1966
STRING: And then, all at once, I remembered her singing voice.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1972
STRING: And the emotions mixed therein.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x198c
STRING: Perhaps it was okay to be used by her.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1998
STRING: She trusted no one and showed no gratitude; she only
sang, and had no qualms about deceiving anyone she
needed to.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x19ae
STRING: If there were anyone else in her ideal vision of the
future, it could only be someone whom she could use
for the rest of her life.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x19d0
STRING: That someone simply happened to be me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x19de
STRING: I was also entranced.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x19ea
STRING: By her fairness, her beauty, and the coarseness of her
spirit.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a1e
STRING: [Fal] “Ah... Ha-ha...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a34
STRING: [Chris] “...What's wrong?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a52
STRING: [Fal] “Do you accept?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a68
STRING: [Chris] “Yes. If others judge you, I will stand by your
side.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1aa8
STRING: [Fal] “Fal.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1abe
STRING: [Chris] “Hmm?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1adc
STRING: [Fal] “My name.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1af2
STRING: [Chris] “...By your side, Fal.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b10
STRING: [Fal] “...Chris.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b3e
STRING: We shared a brief, silent embrace.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b70
STRING: [Fal] “What do we do now?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b86
STRING: [Chris] “Whatever you want, Fal.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1bb8
STRING: [Fal] “I have nowhere to go back to.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1bce
STRING: [Chris] “...What about the shelter?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c00
STRING: [Fal] “I don't want to see that place ever again.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c2e
STRING: It reminds me of my most hateful self.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c44
STRING: [Chris] “...I see. Then will you come with me to my
hometown?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c76
STRING: [Fal] “Would we live there?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c8c
STRING: [Chris] “Not necessarily. Anywhere is fine. But it's
somewhere I have to return to, at least once.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1cc8
STRING: [Fal] “That's true... After the graduation ceremony,
perhaps I could go with you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d00
STRING: I recalled, with great fondness, the faraway streets of
my hometown.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d0e
STRING: I wouldn't see Arietta, of course.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d1a
STRING: I'd only hurt her if I did.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d28
STRING: When I got back to my room, I'd write a letter to her
and end it all.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d4c
STRING: While wishing that someday, Arie would be able to
read that letter.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d92
STRING: [Chris] “...Sorry. I'm afraid that's not possible.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1db0
STRING: That was how I truly felt.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1dbe
STRING: After much thought, I'd arrived at that answer.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1dcc
STRING: I'd been confused up until this moment, but now I knew
that I could never go with her.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1de2
STRING: A relationship built upon using and being used by
others.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1df0
STRING: I found that utterly depressing.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e06
STRING: [Chris] “I just can't understand you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e32
STRING: [Chris] “But I'm not criticizing it. You'll go forward, Fal, in
your own way. You'll be fine without me.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e64
STRING: [Fal] “...Is that so...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e7a
STRING: She didn't say anything else, and merely nodded.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ea6
STRING: [Fal] “Yes, you're bound to be happier this way. I can
see that now.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ee8
STRING: With that, she walked off.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1efe
STRING: This disconnected conversation was the last time we
spoke to each other.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f16
STRING: I watched her head for the school hall, then I followed
behind her.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f2c
STRING: We were going in the same direction, but our paths had
already diverged.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f3a
STRING: She would continue along her path, and I had to find a
new one.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f50
STRING: I didn't know what lay ahead for either of us, but for
now, I shed a few tears over her.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1fe6
STRING: We received nothing more than polite applause, and
then it was all over.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ff4
STRING: Without time even to savor the fading sounds, I saw the
next set of performers standing next to the stage.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x200c
STRING: A student worker instructed us to hurry offstage, so Fal
and I obeyed.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x204a
STRING: Ms. Cordell and two other people were waiting for us
below.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2060
STRING: Before I realized it, Torta and Asino had appeared.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2092
STRING: [Fal] “I'll be at our usual practice room.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x20aa
STRING: Just as the others drew near, Fal whispered that in my
ear and left.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x20c0
STRING: Torta and Ms. Cordell congratulated me on getting
through the performance, the former with her usual
smile, and the latter looking quite disappointed.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x20d6
STRING: No one said anything about how it sounded.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x20ec
STRING: As a performer, I knew all too painfully what that meant.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2102
STRING: So I put on a smile much like Torta's and kept up the
meaningless chatter for a while.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2118
STRING: Our conversation came to an end, then I looked at
Asino, but he waved at me from a distance and then
disappeared.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2138
STRING: Briefly thanking Torta and the others once again for
their kind words, I took my leave.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x217e
STRING: I felt that the answer had already been given, but I had
a responsibility to open that door and speak to her.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x21d8
STRING: [Fal] “That was fast. I thought you'd talk to them for a
while longer.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x21ee
STRING: Fal welcomed me calmly, as if we were about to have a
little chat.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2204
STRING: [Chris] “I wanted to talk to you, Fal.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2236
STRING: [Fal] “I see, but I don't think there's anything left to talk
about.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2256
STRING: [Chris] “I'm now absolutely worthless to you, I guess?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x227e
STRING: [Fal] “Ha-ha, that's pretty horrible way to put it.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2294
STRING: [Chris] “...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x22c6
STRING: [Fal] “Why did you mess up, by the way?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x22dc
STRING: [Chris] “Mess up?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x230e
STRING: [Fal] “You could've performed that song without a single
error, right?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x232e
STRING: [Chris] “...There were a lot of things on my mind, I
couldn't focus.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x236a
STRING: [Fal] “You produced such a good sound, though.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2380
STRING: [Chris] “...A good sound?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x23b2
STRING: [Fal] “...Nothing. Just an idle thought.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x23c8
STRING: [Chris] “Anyway, now that I've served my purpose,
nothing matters anymore, right?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x23fc
STRING: Fal looked quite shocked,

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2420
STRING: and remained silent for a while.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2452
STRING: [Fal] “...Yes, I suppose so.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2468
STRING: Her expression was nearly one of pity.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x247e
STRING: She went on.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2492
STRING: [Fal] “Yes, you're bound to be happier this way. I can
see that now.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x24c6
STRING: Then, her face broke into a genuine smile.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x24d2
STRING: [Chris] “...What are you saying?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2504
STRING: [Fal] “Farewell.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2536
STRING: Without bothering to answer my question, she walked
out of the practice room.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x254c
STRING: This disconnected conversation was the last time we
spoke to each other.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2562
STRING: I watched her head for the school hall, then I walked
out of the practice room too.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2588
STRING: We were going in the same direction, but our paths had
already diverged.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2596
STRING: She would continue along her path, and I had to find a
new one.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x25ac
STRING: I didn't know what lay ahead for either of us, but for
now, I shed a few tears over her.
